title: Empress
description: Now available with P.S., Empress is the hugely popular historical novel of one of Chinaâ€™s most controversial historical its first female emperor, Empress Wu, who emerged in the Tang Dynasty and ushered in a golden age. Writing with epic assurance, poetry, and vivid historic detail, Shan Sa, author of Alexander and Alestria , plumbs the psychological and philosophical depths of what it means to be a striving mortal in a tumultuous, power-hungry world.
author: Shan Sa
